scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.clean: docker-compose down && docker volume prune -f && docker image prune -f
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py migrate
scripts.db:makemigrations: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py loaddata fixtures/initial_users.json && docker-compose exec backend python manage.py loaddata fixtures/tax_rules.json
scripts.db:shell: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U accountia_user -d accountia_dev
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py flush --noinput
scripts.shell:backend: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py shell
scripts.user:create: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py test
scripts.test:coverage: docker-compose exec backend coverage run --source='.' manage.py test && docker-compose exec backend coverage report
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: docker-compose exec backend flake8 . && docker-compose exec backend black --check . && docker-compose exec backend isort --check-only .
scripts.lint:frontend: docker-compose exec frontend npm run lint
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: docker-compose exec backend black . && docker-compose exec backend isort .
scripts.format:frontend: docker-compose exec frontend npm run format
scripts.ai:update-kb: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py update_knowledge_base
scripts.ai:test: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py test_ai_integration
scripts.gcs:setup: echo 'Configura Google Cloud Storage siguiendo la documentaciÃ³n'
scripts.celery:status: docker-compose exec celery_worker celery -A config inspect active
scripts.celery:monitor: docker-compose exec backend celery -A config flower --port=5555
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:services && npm run verify:gcs
scripts.docs: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py spectacular --file docs/api/openapi.yaml
scripts.install:backend: docker-compose exec backend pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.collectstatic: docker-compose exec backend python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
